column2: rookie_mg_2020_1 <- ggplot(f_stat_2020_1, aes(x = "Average minutes per game", y = MP)) + geom_boxplot() + labs(title = "First Round Rookie Players", x = NULL, y = "Minutes") + theme_minimal() + ylim(0, 48) + theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 8))

rookie_mg_2020_2 <- ggplot(f_stat_2020_2, aes(x = "Average minutes per game", y = MP)) + geom_boxplot() + labs(title = "Second Round Rookie Players", x = NULL, y = "Minutes") + theme_minimal() + ylim(0, 48) + theme(plot.title = element_text(size = 10), axis.title.y = element_text(size = 8))

combined_plots_mg_2020 <- rookie_mg_2020_1 + rookie_mg_2020_2 + plot_annotation(title = "Distribution of Minutes per Game Played by 1st vs. 2nd Round Rookies in 2020", theme = theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)))
